title: U.S. slow to respond to EU's landmark tech regulation - POLITICO
content:
1. U.S. slow to respond to EU's landmark tech regulation  POLITICO
  2. A Big Swing at Big Tech  The New York Times
  3. Analysis: New EU rules regulating U.S. tech giants likely to set global standard  Reuters
  4. Europe agrees on big new package of tech rules  Axios
  5. US Tech Giants Face Tough New Rules in Europe  Investopedia
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Biden administration’s response to the EU’s new Digital Markets Act signals continued internal disagreements about how to approach antitrust reforms targeting large tech companies.
